attributes.action: Issue the first National Identity Card free of charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By the time National Identity Cards are required to be carried the issuing system will have been paid for through taxes. On that basis, as we have already paid for it, the first National Identity Card should be issued free of charge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
